00002  * oryx_drive_controller_action_tests.cpp

00004  *  Created on: Oct 10, 2012
00005  *      Author: parallels

00007 
00008 #include<ros/ros.h>
00009 #include<actionlib/client/simple_action_client.h>
00010 #include<oryx_drive_controller/VelocityCommandAction.h>
00011 #include<oryx_drive_controller/TranslateCommandAction.h>
00012 
00013 void print_vel_test_info(double rad, double vel){
00014         ROS_INFO("Testing Velocity Control: <R=%f, V=%f>", rad, vel);
00015 }
00016 
00017 void print_trans_test_info(double x, double y){
00018         ROS_INFO("Testing Translate Control: <X_V=%f, Y_V=%f>", x, y);
00019 }
00020 
00021 
00022 int main(int argc, char** argv){
00023         //Initialize the node
00024         ros::init(argc, argv, "oryx_drive_controller_test");
00025         ros::NodeHandle nh("~");
00026         std::string v_action_topic("velocity_command_topic");   
00027         std::string t_action_topic("translate_command_topic");  
00028 
00029         nh.getParam(v_action_topic, v_action_topic);
00030         nh.getParam(t_action_topic, t_action_topic);
00031         //Set up clients
00032         actionlib::SimpleActionClient<oryx_drive_controller::VelocityCommandAction> ac_v(v_action_topic, true);
00033         actionlib::SimpleActionClient<oryx_drive_controller::TranslateCommandAction> ac_t(t_action_topic, true);
00034         //Wait for connection
00035         ROS_INFO("%s is waiting for servers...", ros::this_node::getName().c_str());
00036         ac_v.waitForServer();
00037         ROS_INFO("Got connection to VelocityCommand server!");
00038         ac_t.waitForServer();
00039         ROS_INFO("Got connection to TraverseCommand server!");
00040 
00041         //Set up test commands
00042         oryx_drive_controller::VelocityCommandGoal v_goal;
00043         oryx_drive_controller::TranslateCommandGoal t_goal;
00044 
00045 
00046         //Test velocity straight line:
00047         v_goal.radius   = std::numeric_limits<double>::infinity();
00048         v_goal.velocity = 1;
00049         print_vel_test_info(v_goal.radius, v_goal.velocity);
00050         ROS_INFO(ac_v.sendGoalAndWait(v_goal,ros::Duration(5000),ros::Duration(5000)).toString().c_str());
00051         //Test velocity straight rotation
00052         v_goal.radius   = 0;
00053         v_goal.velocity = 1;
00054         print_vel_test_info(v_goal.radius, v_goal.velocity);
00055         ROS_INFO(ac_v.sendGoalAndWait(v_goal,ros::Duration(5000),ros::Duration(5000)).toString().c_str());
00056         //Test velocity arbitrary arc
00057         v_goal.radius   = 2.5;
00058         v_goal.velocity = 1;
00059         print_vel_test_info(v_goal.radius, v_goal.velocity);
00060         ROS_INFO(ac_v.sendGoalAndWait(v_goal,ros::Duration(5000),ros::Duration(5000)).toString().c_str());
00061         //Test translate straight x+:
00062         t_goal.x_velocity       = 1;
00063         t_goal.y_velocity       = 0;
00064         print_trans_test_info(t_goal.x_velocity, t_goal.y_velocity);
00065         ROS_INFO(ac_t.sendGoalAndWait(t_goal,ros::Duration(5000),ros::Duration(5000)).toString().c_str());
00066         //Test translate straight x+:
00067         t_goal.x_velocity       = 0;
00068         t_goal.y_velocity       = 1;
00069         print_trans_test_info(t_goal.x_velocity, t_goal.y_velocity);
00070         ROS_INFO(ac_t.sendGoalAndWait(t_goal,ros::Duration(5000),ros::Duration(5000)).toString().c_str());
00071         //Test translate arbitrary vector:
00072         t_goal.x_velocity       = 1;
00073         t_goal.y_velocity       = 1;
00074         print_trans_test_info(t_goal.x_velocity, t_goal.y_velocity);
00075         ROS_INFO(ac_t.sendGoalAndWait(t_goal,ros::Duration(5000),ros::Duration(5000)).toString().c_str());
00076 
00077 }
